extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITE    Level 2 or above.
EXCLUSION    No more than 6.0 units from HIST124; HIST278; HIST279	
EXCLUSION    No more than 6.0 units from HIST260; HIST278, HIST279.	
EXCLUSION    No more than 1 course from HIST219;HIST278; HIST313

basic.description: A study of the major economic, social and political themes. The emphasis is upon the interaction between political events and change in the economy and society.
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: Canada from the Conquest to 1896
